flawed_nl_solution:
On the first day, she will do 10 push-ups.
On the second day, she will do 10 + 5 = <<10+5=19>>19 push-ups.
On the third day, she will do 19 + 5 = <<19+5=24>>24 push-ups.
So, Geli will do a total of 10 + 19 + 24 = <<10+19+24=53>>53 push-ups in a week.
#### 53

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 19. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
